mapper.insert: insert into orders(id, order_no, goods_id, num, user_id, status, time) values (#{id}, #{order_no}, #{goods_id}, #{num}, #{user_id}, #{status}, #{time})
mapper.update: update orders set order_no = #{order_no}, goods_id = #{goods_id}, num = #{num}, user_id = #{user_id}, status = #{status}, time = #{time} where id = #{id}
